features: Be Confident and Walk out knowing you look your very best. No more missing smudged eye makeup, unseen blemishes, stray hairs, or small specks between your teeth. This mirror helps you make sure everything on your face is exactly how and where it should be.
Mirror Magnified - This 15X magnification mirror with our stylish acrylic frame is perfect for up close tweezing or makeup application.

Large Viewing Area is a must! Don't be fooled by tiny 20X mirrors. They are smaller than a compact and are too small to see more than your eye. This circular 6 inch mirror with frame features over 5" of mirror. It shows you what you need to see while applying cosmetics or shaving.
Suction Cup – our 15X magnification mirror has 3 suction cups to make mounting easy and secure. The mirror is portable and because it is not a swivel mirror it is truly small enough for travel.

What is a Concave Mirror? A concave mirror shows different image types depending on the distance between the mirror and the object. If you get too far away, the image will get fuzzy and or appear upside down. The only way to create a magnification mirror is to make it concave. Please don't expect to stand back and see your entire reflection with our 15X mirror. You must be very close to the mirror to get the optimum benefit.
A Califonia Company – Essential Skin Solutions is based in Southern California where we care about you and your experieince. .

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GET READY TO BE CONFIDENT EVERY DAY Have you ever wondered if you are missing a stray hair or blemish? Have you ever wondered if your eyeliner is even or if there is a mascara smudge on your eyelid? Have you ever wished you could quickly and easily put your eyeliner on straight or put in your contacts without all the hassle of getting out your tabletop magnifying mirror? At Essential Skin Solutions, we know the struggle is real. With this in mind, we developed this stylish 15 x Magnifying Mirror that looks great in your bathroom, takes up very little space, but still gives you all the viewing area you need to quickly tweeze your brows, apply makeup, or get rid any unwanted craziness on your face. This convenient beauty tool is the ORIGINAL 15X Magnifying Mirror and has consistently been THE go-to mirror for women who want to look and feel their best.

15X Magnification Helps You look Your Best Taking the time to check your appearance doesn't have to be an all-day affair. Having our 15X Magnifying Mirror mounted to your bathroom mirror makes quick checks a breeze. Whether you are looking to perfect your eyebrow arch with your favorite pair of tweezers, add that last minute winged eyeliner, or just doing a quick check of your pores and teeth this mirror is the perfect bathroom vanity companion.

SUCTION CUP MOUNTING SUCTION CUP MOUNTING – our 15X magnification mirror has 3 suction cups to make mounting easy and secure. The mirror is portable and because it is not a swivel mirror it is truly small enough for travel. BE CONFIDENT BE CONFIDENT and Walk out knowing you look your very best. No more missing smudged eye makeup, unseen blemishes, stray hairs, or small specks between your teeth. This mirror helps you make sure everything on your face is exactly how and where it should be. LARGE VIEWING AREA LARGE VIEWING AREA is a must! Don't be fooled by tiny 20X mirrors. They are smaller than a compact and are too small to see more than your eye. This circular 6 inch mirror shows you what you need to see while applying cosmetics or shaving.

Here's why the Reflection Perfection 15X Magnifying Mirror is the BEST Suction Cup Mounted MIRROR for your bathroom or travel: 15X MAGNIFYING MIRROR - the 15 X magnification allows you to see up close + larger size means you can see more of your faceLARGE MIRROR - 6" round (5 inch viewable) but only 3/4 " thick - the perfect size to see what you need without taking up too much spaceELEGANT CLEAR ACRYLIC FRAME with Sleek Professional Makeup Mirror designSUCTION CUP MOUNTING – most mirrors are mounted with just two suction cups or a big single cup that awkwardly sticks out. This sleek mountable mirror has 3 suction cups so it is easy to mount and stays where you put it.PORTABLE TRAVEL MIRROR – mirror easily comes off and can be remounted repeatedly so you can take it with you.HANDHELD MAKEUP MIRROR – this mirror can also be unmounted to use hand held.PERFECT FOR DETAIL WORK - like eyeliner application or tweezing eyebrows.Don't be fooled by TINY 20X mirrors. The extra magnification is not usable because at under 4-inch diameter the mirror is too small and blurry!

Here's why the Reflection Perfection 15X Magnifying Mirror is the BEST Suction Cup Mounted MIRROR for your bathroom or travel: 15X MAGNIFYING MIRROR - the 15 X magnification allows you to see up close + larger size means you can see more of your faceLARGE MIRROR - 6" round (5 inch viewable) but only 3/4 " thick - the perfect size to see what you need without taking up too much spaceELEGANT CLEAR ACRYLIC FRAME with Sleek Professional Makeup Mirror designSUCTION CUP MOUNTING – most mirrors are mounted with just two suction cups or a big single cup that awkwardly sticks out. This sleek mountable mirror has 3 suction cups so it is easy to mount and stays where you put it.PORTABLE TRAVEL MIRROR – mirror easily comes off and can be remounted repeatedly so you can take it with you.HANDHELD MAKEUP MIRROR – this mirror can also be unmounted to use hand held.PERFECT FOR DETAIL WORK - like eyeliner application or tweezing eyebrows.Don't be fooled by TINY 20X mirrors. The extra magnification is not usable because at under 4-inch diameter the mirror is too small and blurry!

Why Buy from ESS: Essential Skin Solutions is located in California where healthy living is a natural part of our lives. We source products from all over the world to bring you the best unique items that are great for your skin. We believe in being kind to ourselves and each other. Like you, we also believe great skin is the result of consistent daily rituals and that all women are beautiful. Let us be part of your skincare routine. You will love the results. At Essential Skin Solutions, our goal is to make sure it's easy to be confident in your own beauty. You've got this and we've got you covered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and clear
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, sticks very well to my main mirror. Clean cut product and clear visibility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally A Clear View Mirror
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy to have found the perfect travel mirror!I can not tell you how many inferior mirrors I have purchased in the past just to find out they're so distorted, except maybe the inner inch or so in which I could kinda see my eye. As time has gone on I needed to get a stronger and stronger mirror and when you get to a 15x it gets nearly impossible to get a clear travel mirror.This mirror is super clear, no distortion, and the viewing area is large. I can actually put on my makeup in it. Follow their directions to start at the distance away, and move out, it really helps to see if it is a clear view for you.The suction cups are really strong. I kinda felt I needed to hold it on the mirror the first use because I was afraid it would fall. Nope! I had to pry it off the mirror because of the suction is super strong.In the past I was toting my big plug in mirror all over the map just to put on makeup. It was taking up so much space in my suitcase, but I was desperate. NO MORE! This takes up so little space, it's light, and works like a charm. More space for my clothes, etc... now! I won't leave home with out it in my travels!!Now I only have to remember to remove it from the hotel mirror before checking out, I wish there was an alarm on this baby so I wouldn't forget it. I'm thinking of ordering another one just in case I do forget it.When you find something you love, it's nice to have a back up.I can totally recommend the purchase of this, and no, no one gave me a thing for this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mirror but...
reviews.reviewText: Clarity and magnification of this mirror is great but it does not stick to a larger mirror. Not sure why it doesn't so I just just use it as hand held.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems like more than 15x magnification!
reviews.reviewText: This mirror surface is curved so there’s a specific distance required to have the reflection focused. I wasn’t a fan at first but wow, once I saw all the things my flat 15x mirror was missing, I now wouldn’t be without this! Amazing for tweezing brows. The suction cups are strong and work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The magnification was correct on this mirror unlike others I had ordered

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too hard to use
reviews.reviewText: This is kind of a weird mirror. I wish it weren't curved with an upside down image when you step away from it too far. I can't use it unless I get right up close to it. It also reflects light in an annoying sort of way. The image that I see is not very sharp or precise. It works well enough to do my eye makeup, but it's next to useless for tweezing small hairs because the way it reflects light makes any little hairs practically invisible somehow. The suction cups work ok though. It did fall down once or twice, but it didn't break.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s the perfect magnification
reviews.reviewText: It’s the perfect magnification for putting on makeup or any facial needs. The six inch size is perfect as well. The suction cups work well but I also taped them to the glass window just in case since the last two I purchased from Walmart fell off and broke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023

reviews.reviewText: This is a great mirror to see anything close up. Great for make up application.
Lindo pequeño practico y funciona bien. Me gustaria una base tipo pedestal para tenerla mas en una mesa a la altura de la cara. Pero por el precio no pido mas.
Superb product. As shown. Very classy product. Although heavy for travelling

reviews.reviewTitle: Product is exactly as described, and real glass mirror used.
reviews.reviewText: Product is exactly as described, and real glass mirror used.
Great mirror and very suitable to add to the travel bags
